description: #RailBudget2016 a progressive, dynamic & passenger centric: PM Modi Be it the poor, women or youth, #RailBudget2016 caters to all sections of society: PM Modi Last year we have seen lot of success & this budget is an effort to further improve on this: PM on #RailBudget2016 Along with using latest te…
caption: nm-4.com
message:
A passenger centric #RailBudget2016 without any fare hike. यात्री की गरिमा, रेल की गति और राष्ट्र की प्रगति। 

Our efforts to comprehensively transform railways will gain even more momentum with this development oriented budget. The boost to investment outlay shows our Government's long term vision for the Railways & the Nation. 

The Rail Budget caters to all sections of society. It stands out because it is an infrastructure-led & employment generating budget. It showcases a vision to reorganise, restructure & rejuvenate Railways with new processes, structures, norms & sources of revenue.

Launch of unreserved, superfast trains, Antyodaya Express & Deen Dayalu coaches illustrate our unwavering commitment to serving the poor. Announcement to strengthen rail connectivity in Manipur & Mizoram is gladdening. Connectivity in Northeast is one of our core priorities.

The Vision 2020 will make the Indian Railways free from capacity constraints with higher train speed, punctuality & safety. http://nm-4.com/6uyg
